Flow.description: This flow is used to create Student Concern Cases
Flow.label: Student Concern Case

recordLookups.description: Uses the Account Id of the student selected and the associated Program of the Account the logged in user is running as to identify the correct Enrollment Record to link the case to.
recordLookups.name: Get_Enrollment_Record_from_Account_and_Program
recordLookups.label: Get Enrollment Record from Account and Program

fields.name: Intro_Prompt
fields.fieldText: Click "Submit a Case" if you would like to create a new Student Concern Case.

fields.name: Date_of_incident
fields.fieldText: Date Incident was reported to Verto?

fields.name: When_did_the_incident_occur
fields.fieldText: When did the incident occur?

fields.name: What_is_the_priority_of_the_incident
fields.fieldText: What is the priority of the incident?

fields.name: Full_description_of_incident
fields.fieldText: Full description of incident:

fields.name: Actions_taken_in_response_to_the_incident
fields.fieldText: Actions taken in response to the incident.

fields.name: Medical_treatment_received_Where_administered_Hospital_Doctor_on_call
fields.fieldText: Medical treatment received? Where administered ?(Hospital, Doctor on call)

fields.name: Have_parents_or_guardians_been_notified
fields.fieldText: Have parents or guardians been notified?

fields.name: Indicate_the_names_of_parent_s_or_guardian_s_who_were_notified
fields.fieldText: Indicate the names of parent(s) or guardian(s) who were notified.

fields.name: When_were_parent_s_or_guardian_s_notified
fields.fieldText: When were parent(s) or guardian(s) notified?

fields.name: Provide_detailed_notes_on_your_conversation_with_parent_s_or_guardian_s_if_appli
fields.fieldText: Provide detailed notes on your conversation with parent(s) or guardian(s) if applicable.

fields.name: Follow_Up_Required
fields.fieldText: Follow Up Required?

fields.name: Date_of_next_follow_up
fields.fieldText: Date of next follow up:

fields.name: What_type_of_follow_up_is_needed
fields.fieldText: What type of follow up is needed?

fields.name: Is_the_Student_Subject_to_Disciplinary_Actions_0
fields.fieldText: Is the Student Subject to Disciplinary Actions?

fields.name: CISI_or_AXA_Travel_Assist_Case_if_case_is_opened
fields.fieldText: CISI &/or AXA Travel Assist Case # (if case is opened)

fields.name: Medical_Cost_Covered
fields.fieldText: Medical Costs covered by Verto (if applicable). Remember to send copies of receipts to safety@vertoeducation.org.

fields.name: Persons_Involved
fields.fieldText:
Person(s) Involved

Provide information on the person(s) involved in the incident to the best of your knowledge.

fields.name: Primary_Student_s_or_Staff_involved_or_injured_List_as_Name_student_or_Name_staf
fields.fieldText: Primary Student(s) or Staff involved or injured. List as "Name - student" or "Name - staff".

fields.name: Where_in_Journey_0
fields.fieldText: Where in Journey?

fields.name: Who_responded_to_the_incident_List_Verto_staff_member_name_s_and_other_responder
fields.fieldText: Who responded to the incident? List Verto staff member name(s) and other responders separately.

fields.name: Did_anyone_witness_the_incident_Was_anyone_else_involved_non_Verto_staff_non_Ver
fields.fieldText: Did anyone witness the incident? Was anyone else involved? (non-Verto staff, non-Verto students)
